bangudesc:
la sutysisku is a fast dictionary for Lingwa de planeta language.

- Can I use it if I lose internet access?
- Yes, if this happens try opening this very address from this browser.
It should still open. A latest version of Chrome, Safari or Firefox is required.

For more resources visit Facebook TiddlyDict group or e-mail gleki.is.my.name@gmail.com.
siskudescr: Search the Lingwa de Planeta (Lidepla) dictionary la sutysisku.
opdescr: A dictionary for Lidepla (Lingwa de Planeta), Lojban, English and other languages. Can work offline!
